definitions.definition: used when the subject of the verb is "they" or a group of people, and the object is the same group of people:
examples: They asked themselves where they had gone wrong.

definitions.definition: used for emphasis when the subject is "they":
examples: They themselves had no knowledge of what was happening.

definitions.definition: alone or without help from anyone else:
examples: Young children should not be left by themselves.
They had the whole campsite to themselves.
